name: The Lantern King
content:
The Lantern King

The Laughing Lie

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 24
Pathfinder Wiki The Lantern King

Details

Alignment CN
Pantheon Eldest
Areas of Concern Laughter, mischief, transformation
Domains Charm, Chaos, Madness, Trickery
Subdomains Deception, Love, Lust, Thievery
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Dagger
Symbol Golden lantern containing colored lights
Sacred Animal(s) Firefly
Sacred Color(s) Black, gold

Obedience

Light a small lantern and tell it a joke or the story of a prank you played on someone-this must be a different joke or story each time. You gain a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws versus illusions.

Boons - Fey Obedience

Feysworn

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 24
1: Prankster's Touch disguise self 3/day, hideous laughter 2/day, or suggestion 1/day
2: Transform Others You can cast polymorph any object once per day.
3: Anyone and Anything (Sp) You can cast shapechange once per day.

For Followers of The Lantern King

Archetypes

Fey Prankster (Bard)

Feats

Fey Friend

Traits

Shaper of Reality
